- high time synchronization through Precision Time Protocol (IEEE1588) - 90ns
- low cost - parts, enclosure, PCB manufacturing - 150 ojro
- powering external or Pover over Ethernet (IEEE 802.3af)
- Ethernet through UTP cable or fibre connection
- universal system with exchangeable measure modules
- easy to extend and develop separately 
- asymmetric, 2-core microcontroller - measurement independent from main core load
- real-time system (FreeRTOS) on Cortex-M4 core
